tasks.label: Build and Run Example
tasks.command: cmake --install ./build --prefix ${workspaceFolder}/example && cmake -S ${workspaceFolder}/example -B ${workspaceFolder}/example/build && cmake --build ${workspaceFolder}/example/build && echo ========== RUN ========== && ${workspaceFolder}/example/build/level-example && echo ========== END ==========

tasks.label: Build Release
tasks.command: mkdir -p ${workspaceFolder}/release && cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -S ${workspaceFolder} -B ${workspaceFolder}/release && cmake && cmake --build ${workspaceFolder}/release && pushd . && cd ${workspaceFolder}/release/ && cpack -G DEB && popd
